ABOUT US
At Pinelake Village, we offer
a relaxed friendly and easy life for you, in a modern manufactured home community. Our 55 plus manufactured home community is beautifully designed and located in
Martin County, Jensen Beach, Florida.  Strict, low-density specifications of 5.8 units per acre is your assurance that your community will always remain uncrowded.
OUR FACILITIES
Our clubhouse is the gathering place in our community for committee meetings, social events, or just to relax with friends.  In our clubhouse, we support a furnished kitchen, large inlaid teak dance floor with a surround sound system, library, exercise room, Billiard room and a card room.  Outside is a large swimming pool, spa and shuffle board courts.
OUR RESIDENTS
We have many wonderful people that make up the heart of Pinelake Village.  Our residents enjoy a variety of planned events such as Wii bowling, water aerobics, Poker, golf, potluck dinners, scheduled parties, game night, Bridge, boat rides, trips to the Jupiter Theater, West Palm Beach Zoo, baseball games and many other fun activities.
Click on calendar to enlarge.

ABOUT US
At Pinelake Village, we offer a relaxed friendly and easy life for you, in a modern manufactured home community. Our 55 plus manufactured home community is beautifully designed and located in
Martin County, Jensen Beach, Florida.  Strict, low-density specifications of 5.8 units per acre is your assurance that your community will always remain uncrowded.
OUR FACILITIES
Our clubhouse is the gathering place in our community for committee meetings, social events, or just to relax with friends.  In our clubhouse, we support a furnished kitchen, large inlaid teak dance floor with a surround sound system, library, exercise room, Billiard room and a card room.  Outside is a large swimming pool, spa and shuffle board courts.
OUR RESIDENTS
We have many wonderful people that make up the heart of Pinelake Village.  Our residents enjoy a variety of planned events such as Wii bowling, water aerobics, Poker, golf, potluck dinners, scheduled parties, game night, Bridge, boat rides, trips to the Jupiter Theater, West Palm Beach Zoo, baseball games and many other fun activities.
Welcome to Pinelake Village!
Welcome to our community~!  We welcome you to browse through our site~!
A family owned and run business~!
In Loving Memory.....
We would like to share some of our family history with you.  Our Grandfather passed this beautiful community onto his family and we are the proud owners that strive to make this the best Manufactured Housing Community.
Our Grandfather, Ralph C. Barding, began his career in  Manufactured Housing  (AKA Trailer and Mobile Homes) in 1946 in Decatur, Illinois.  After having 36 sales locations across the United States he built Park City to have a nice community in which to place these homes.  The community still exists and had 620 sites at the time that he sold and moved to Florida.
RV/MH Hall of Fame
Our Uncle, Jerry Barding, joined the Corporation in 1970 and Carol (Mom) later joined in 1982 after her three daughters were raised.  In the spring of 1973, Ralph purchased Golf View Estates in Pompano Beach, Florida.  He was just too dynamic to slow down and needed something to keep him busy.
In the spring of 1986 we sold Park City in Decatur, IL and purchased Pinelake Village, in Jensen Beach, Florida, which my family now owns and operates.
Our Grandmother, Mary Barding, passed in 1992 and our Grandfather, Ralph Barding, passed on Christmas morning 2007 at the age of 96 years.
Since purchasing Pinelake Village we have made several great improvements in the community.  Including a new swimming pool complex;  a complete remodel and refurbishing of the clubhouse. Martin County recently completed construction of a beautiful new bridge at our entrance.
Once you enter our office you will notice our family.  Nicole Stark, will greet you with a big smile and will be happy to guide you around our facilities.  Chris Burkard (part owner), President of our Board of Directors, is our General Manager and has her fingers on the pulse of Pinelake Village. Nick Daly, does the bookkeeping for the community. Taylor Stark runs our ground maintence. Other immediate family engaged in the corporation are Vicki Livasy (part owner) and Vice President on our Board of Directors. and her husband, Mark Livasy, serves on our Board of Directors.  We are a great family held corporation serving our residents as we ourselves would want to be served.  We would be remiss if I did not mention our CPA, Brad Himmel, that also serves on the Board of Directors.
"We are a family held corporation serving our residents
as we ourselves, would want to be served."
Thank you for visiting our site. Visit our community.
Buy into a new, relaxed and a very social way of living!
Hope to see you soon~!
Owner, Chris Burkard, is our General Manager and President on our Board of Directors.
Owner, Vicki Livasy, is our Vice-President on our Board of Directors and also does our web site.
Nicole Stark, is our receptionist.
Nick Daly, is our bookkeeper.
In memory of my youngest daughter, Robyn Thulin. March 16, 1964 to January 12, 2019.  Robyn was the Secretary on our Board of Directors.
We pride ourselves on our community and hope you will become a part of our community home!
At Pinelake Village, we offer a relaxed friendly and easy life for you, in a modern
manufactured home community
.  Our 55 plus manufactured home community is beautifully designed and located in
Martin County, Jensen Beach, Florida
.  Strict, low-density specifications of 5.8 units per acre is your assurance that your community
will always remain uncrowded.
A perfect location located just minutes from the sparkling Atlantic Ocean, St. Lucie River and the Indian River.
Atlantic Ocean
When you purchase a manufactured home in Pinelake Village, many things in your life will change. And you'll love it! Tall pines and spacious grounds landscaped with rich tropical foliage will replace concrete and congestion. Rather than fighting busy freeways, you will be driving over quiet
Martin County
roads: only minutes away are the long stretches of Atlantic Ocean beaches for which this area has become famous.
Without doubt your life will change. You will be living, and loving, life in the most enviable setting in Florida.
Modern
manufactured home
living is truly plush and relaxing. Homes that are for sale come either furnished or unfurnished, whichever suits your everyday
need for a life of leisure
.
Each home is on a spacious, beautifully tropical landscaped lot. All lots at Pinelake Village are more than 4000 square feet.  Perfect for those who enjoy gardening. All transmission lines are underground and cable TV connections are offered to you, at a lower rate than others in the area.
Within a few miles of this fine community are fine shopping malls and specialty shops, excellent restaurants, nightclubs and theaters.
If sports are your fancy, spring training for the New York Mets is only 20 miles away in Port St. Lucie. Adult education facilities, including Indian River Community College, are 18½ miles away. Shopping galore at Treasure Coast Mall is 3 miles away and Palm Beach Gardens Mall is only 25 miles away. The experience of your life awaits you at Walt Disney World in Orlando, 120 miles away. If you plan to travel or have friends or family visiting, Palm Beach Airport is 37 miles away. Most major faiths and religious persuasions are catered for within the immediate area.
Pinelake Village is located in Jensen Beach, a sleepy little town within the heart of Martin County. This glorious coastal area of southeast Florida is completely surrounded by open waters. The mile wide Indian River, the broad St. Lucie inlet and the magnificent ocean with its miles of exotic beaches and deep-sea charter boat fishing are all within minutes of Pinelake Village. The fresh waters of the Jensen Savanna's are nearby and provide some of the best bass fishing in Florida.
The climate in the area is ideal.  The average annual temperature is 74 degrees and it is an outdoor life you'll love.

HOW TO GET TO PINELAKE
VILLAGE,
JENSEN BEACH, FLORIDA
wordpress themes blogger
From Federal Highway (Route 1), turn east on Jensen Beach Boulevard.
At the fourth stop light, turn right (south) on Savanna Road (SR 723).
Pinelake Village
is located one mile on your left (east).
